DOC.HEAD: Prices Down
Eds: New throughout
DOC.TEXT: Stocks fell in quiet trading Thursday, reflecting a pre-Christmas slowdown throughout Europe. The Financial Times-Stock Exchange 100-share index fell 7.7 points, or 0.3 percent, to 2,353.0. The Financial Times 30-share index fell 7.2 points to 1,858.8. The Financial Times 500-share index fell 3.85 points to 1,276.84. Volume amounted to 438.0 million shares, compared with 552.9 million shares Wednesday.
